text: Ki tusim nahi vekhade ki alaha ne dharati di'am cizam nu tuhadi seva vica laga dita hai ate kisati'am nu vi. Uha usa de hukama nala sagara vica caladi'am hana. Ate alaha ne apane hukama nala asamana nu dharati tom digana tom thamri'a ho'i'a hai. Besaka alaha lokam te narami karana vala ate rahimata vala hai
